name: Witch Way (Final Alpha)
description:
This game was made by 32 students for a schoolproject in 9 weeks.

In the game Witch Way you are a student Witch who needs to pay for school supplies and new spell books to study from. To do so, you have decided to get a summer job as a delivery person for one of the richest and most successful witch in the city: Lady Deep Grace. But don't underestimate the job, The dangerous city of Trimore is full of surprises and shady figures who will do anything to steal your packages

Please fill in our short form to give us feedback:

Dutch: https://forms.gle/bbjv4uJb93bTFY686

http://witchwaygame.com/
